text:
Bound Round | Web Designer/Developer | Sydney or Newcastle, Australia | ONSITE (Mostly), https://www.boundround.com, 70k - 90k DOE

Bound Round is looking for a designer who can code, or a coder who can design. You'd be joining a small, fun team and have lots of input in many aspects of the business. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills will come in handy.

Shoot me an email if interested: donovan@boundround.com
